metadata.title: CVE-2020-28596 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in theObjparser::objparse() functionality of Prusa Research PrusaSlicer 2.2.0 andMaster (commit 4b040b856). A specially crafted obj file can lead to codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
